problem_text: In \triangle A B C, C D is an altitude and m \angle A C B = 90. If A D = 12 and B D = 3, find A C to the nearest tenth.
compact_text: In \triangle ABC, CD is an altitude and m \angle ACB = 90. If AD = 12 and BD = 3, find AC to the nearest tenth.
annotat_text: In $\triangle A B C, C D$ is an altitude and $m \angle A C B=90^{\circ}$ If $A D=12$ and $B D=3,$ find $A C$ to the nearest tenth.
